general.text: You find your favorite books and magazines inside. It’s party time!
Your favorite guilty-pleasure novel stares at you from the space-shelve. You barely resist the urge to stop whatever important thing you were doing and just read this sucker.
Finally some peace and quiet. You just now realize though that you left your reading glasses back on earth. That’s not fair. That’s not fair at all.
It’s an exercise bike. Way cool. It even has a tv monitor attached to it. It doesn’t have your favorite channel though.
It is a ladder and it leads upstairs to a bathroom and to the other modules inside the capsule. What would you like to do?
Where would you like go?
You go to the bathroom. Nice job!
You do nothing. Nice job!
There are several identical pairs of clothing in this cabinet. Keeping up with the latest fashions will likely be difficult here. There are also lots of socks.
This is your
Sleeping Compartment
. It doesn’t look incredibly comfortable. Do you want to go to sleep anyway?
You try to sleep but something keeps you from your rest. It is almost like you still have something to do before your day is over.
You decide not to go to sleep. You are also not exactly sure how to get up there anyway.
This is your window to the universe. Would you like to close it?
This is your window to the universe. Would you like to open it?
This is a nice white folding table which you can use as you please.
This complex hydro-dispenser is able to reconstitute excess liquids intro drinkable though tasteless water.
This chair is specifically designed to make you as uncomfortable as possible. It is a mystery why anyone would build such a thing.
This monitor seems to simply display random waves and charts. You can't tell if it is really monitoring anything and pressing the big buttons has no effect on the charts.

This machine distributes highly concentrated nutritional supplements that provide the entirety of a day’s recommended intake of vitamins and proteins in a small brown pellet. The machine randomly varies the taste each one has to keep life interesting. Would you like a pellet?
You don't get a pellet.
You get a pellet and eat it. It fills you up quickly. It tastes like a peanut butter sandwich.
You get a pellet and eat it. Your jumpsuit rips from your significantly increased girth. It tastes like overly-buttered movie popcorn.
The machine refuses to give you a pellet and advises you spend time on the exercise bike.
